<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156695</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156695</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1002</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Translation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tradução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Traduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάφραση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traducción</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online english course, meant to give examples and of the level expected from learners in 12th grade, learning english as their second language.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein englischer Onlinekurs, bedeutet, um Beispiele 
und der Stufe zu geben erwartet von den Anfängern im 12. Grad, 
erlernenenglisch als ihre zweite Sprache.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un cours anglais en ligne, censé pour donner des 
exemples et du niveau prévu des étudiants dans la 12ème catégorie,
l'anglais d'étude en tant que leur deuxième langage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um curso inglês em linha, significado dar 
exemplos e do nível esperado dos learners na 1à classe, inglês de 
aprendizagem como sua segunda língua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un corso inglese in linea, significato per fornire
gli esempi e del livello atteso dai principianti nel dodicesimo grado,
inglese imparante come loro secondo linguaggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση αγγλική σειρά μαθημάτων, που
προορίζεται να δώσει τα παραδείγματα και του επιπέδου που 
αναμένεται από τους αρχαρίους στη 12$η τάξη, τα μαθαίνοντας 
αγγλικά ως δεύτερη γλώσσα τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un curso inglés en línea, significado para dar 
ejemplos y del nivel esperado de principiantes en el 12mo grado, 
inglés que aprende como su segundo lenguaje.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tradução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alfabeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soletração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ortografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετάφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλφάβητο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορθογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">traducción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">deletreo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
